mutants.original_line: has_vowel = any(char in vowels for char in word)
mutants.mutated_line: has_vowel = any((char not in vowels for char in word))

mutants.original_line: has_consonant = any(char not in vowels and char.isalpha() for char in word)
mutants.mutated_line: has_consonant = any((char not in vowels or char.isalpha() for char in word))

mutants.original_line: has_consonant = any(char not in vowels and char.isalpha() for char in word)
mutants.mutated_line: has_consonant = any((char in vowels and char.isalpha() for char in word))
